name: Autumn Hollow: Post-Jam Edition
description:
Ichabod seeks to woo Trina, but it won't be easy.

The Post-Jam Edition (v1.1) incorporates bug fixes and additional polish, including a location marker in the map, a tweaked day/night cycle, and more.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Space to interact

Left Shift to dash

Enter to sing (requires psalm-book)

M to open Map Screen

Q to open Quests Screen

Original version created in 3 weeks for The Great Autumn Game Jam 2021. Best in fullscreen mode.

Design, art and coding by Alexander Kazazis

Music from the Ultimate Game Music Collection
